data.description: This handmade pendant ceramic lamp features a unique printed decoration of green leaves, creating a stunning and eye-catching light fixture. Crafted from high-quality clay, it boasts a height of 17.7 inches and a diameter of 7.9 inches, making it an ideal lighting solution for living rooms, offices, and other indoor spaces. Its versatile design allows for various stacking options, offering endless possibilities for customization. The lamp's forest green, white, mint, burgundy, and orange color palette adds a touch of sophistication and vibrancy to any decor.

targetAudience.targetAudience: Home decorators with a taste for unique and handmade lighting fixtures
targetAudience.useCase: Adding a touch of bohemian flair to their living room or office space

targetAudience.targetAudience: Art collectors interested in contemporary ceramic pieces
targetAudience.useCase: Displaying the lamp as a functional art object in their home or studio

targetAudience.targetAudience: Individuals looking for a statement piece for their home
targetAudience.useCase: Creating a focal point in their living room or dining area with the lamp's striking design
